attributes.name: type
attributes.title: Type
attributes.description: Type of date picker

attributes.name: value
attributes.title: Value
attributes.description: Date and/or time selected

attributes.name: reset-text
attributes.title: Reset text
attributes.description: Text that resets the views to the current date

attributes.name: locale
attributes.title: Locale
attributes.description: String representing localization. Market, language, calendar type and numbering system

attributes.name: name
attributes.title: Name
attributes.description: Name of the form element

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.title: Placeholder
attributes.description: Text used for placeholder when a date and/or time is not selected

attributes.name: appearance
attributes.title: Appearance
attributes.description: The text field's visual treatment

attributes.name: readonly
attributes.title: Readonly
attributes.description: If the date is editable

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.title: Disabled
attributes.description: If the date is disabled

attributes.name: required
attributes.title: Required
attributes.description: If the date is required

attributes.name: min
attributes.title: Minumum date
attributes.description: Earliest date allowed

attributes.name: max
attributes.title: Maximum date
attributes.description: Latest date allowed

attributes.name: allow-text-input
attributes.title: Allow text input
attributes.description: If the control allows text entry or just date picking

attributes.name: day-format
attributes.title: Day format
attributes.description: The formatting for the day in the outputted date.

attributes.name: weekday-format
attributes.title: Weekday format
attributes.description: The formatting for the weekday in the outputted date.

attributes.name: month-format
attributes.title: Month format
attributes.description: The formatting for the month in the outputted date.

attributes.name: year-format
attributes.title: Year format
attributes.description: The formatting for the year in the outputted date.

attributes.name: hour-format
attributes.title: Hour format
attributes.description: The formatting for the hour in the outputted time.

attributes.name: minute-format
attributes.title: Minute format
attributes.description: The formatting for the minutes in the outputted time.

attributes.name: placeholder
attributes.title: Placeholder
attributes.description: Text used for placeholder when a date and/or time is not selected

slots.title: Default slot
slots.description: The child nodes to scroll through

slots.name: start
slots.title: Start slot
slots.description: Contents of the start slot are positioned above the horizontal-scroll

slots.name: end
slots.title: End slot
slots.description: Contents of the end slot are positioned below the horizontal-scroll
